item.title: Finally, Someone Designed an Airplane Seat Headrest That Actually Looks Comfortable
item.description:
Finally, Someone Designed an Airplane Seat Headrest That Actually Looks Comfortable

Current airplane headrest designs do little more than leave you with an irreversible case of bed head (minus the actual sleeping part of the process). A Dutch industrial designer named Manon KÃ¼hne has graced us all with a headrest we can only hope will become a regular airplane feature.

item.title: 10 Best Business Travel Tips From The Experts
item.description:
10 Best Business Travel Tips From The Experts

I love traveling for business. I am so much more productive while I'm in the air or at the airport - no distractions! I've traveled more frequently than ever this year between work, weddings and various projects that I've developed quite a wealth of knowledge about navigating airports, planning, packing and everything in between.
